data.name: AbemaTV 一部チャンネルの非表示化他
data.description:
トップページのチャンネル一覧で、まったく見る気のないチャンネルを非表示にします。
その他、トップページ向けの機能が若干あります。

チャンネルをCHと略している箇所があります。
各設定の既定値は公式にあわせているので、全ての設定を真剣に考えないでも大丈夫です。
意味不明な項目は放置で、これを変えたい！という項目だけいじれば、そこだけ変わって他は公式通りの表示になるはずです。

data.name: Modern STINE Theme
data.description: STINE is the online platform used by students of the University of Hamburg. The design looks outdated and can be improved upon. This userstyle provides a design more aligned with the design of the other University of Hamburg pages. This allows for a more colorful design instead of the varying greytones used in STINE otherwise.

data.description: This is a theme for the roblox site.

data.name: P9夜间模式
data.description:
本CSS样式为P9的夜间模式，为了方便夜间使用而编写的。
由于自己日常使用界面有限，可能并不是所有元素都进行了合适的更改，如有发现希望得到各位的反馈以便后期更新。

⭐全站启用护眼黑色调显示
⭐支持帖子的隐藏文字[musk]鼠标划过显示(可选)

data.name: Twitter Undistracted
data.description: A minimized Twitter interface with a motivation that lets you focus more on what people tweet and response with less judgments on their character. What this style does to your Twitter * Removes profile picture, because you don't wanna care what people look like * Removes followings/followers count, because it adds nothing valuable in this society * Removes unnecessary tabs and sidebar, because it's distracting * Keeps you focus and avoid unnecessary simping over stupid tweets by a twitter thot Found bugs and in need of improvements, DM me @binatangberuk No longer on Twitter. Snail mail me @ ctrlaltdel [at] cock [dot] li

data.name: Darker YouTube
data.description:
YouTube styled in Dark Grays, clean and easy on the eyes. 
Matching the other skins in the "Darker" series. 

EnjoY!

data.description: A custom background for your avatar editor.

data.name: Dreamwidth - Muted
data.description:
A muted layout for dreamwidth.

Widens the layout and dulls the color scheme.  For use with the "Tropospherical Purple" scheme on dreamwidth.

For instructions on how to use, see http://vigils.dreamwidth.org/7369.html
